title: 2020 Ram Rebel 1500 4x4 Hemi 5.7L V8
item_description:

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, and smog certificate will be mailed within 3-4 weeks after pickup, as the lien holder signs and releases title. Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to DMV.
